Container.Name: CUPS
Container.Overview: CUPS is the standards-based, open source printing system developed by Apple Inc. for OS X® and other UNIX®-like operating systems. CUPS uses the Internet Printing Protocol (IPP) to support printing to local and network printers.[br][br] [b]This container has support for AirPrint and for Google CloudPrint.[/b]
